Package com.krab.lazy.input

Class UserInputPublisher

java.lang.Object
com.krab.lazy.input.UserInputPublisher
public class UserInputPublisher extends Object
Internal LazyGui class used to register with PApplet user input events. Must be public for PApplet to be able to reach it, but not meant to be used or even looked at by library users.
